name: 攻撃
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 速さ
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 守備
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 魔防
description: After combat, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
戦闘後、敵と、その周囲２マスの敵の守備、魔防 -7 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: バシリコス・専用
description: Grants Atk/Spd+5. Inflicts Def/Res-5

name: オートクレール・専用
description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.
奥義発動時、奥義によるダメージ +10

name: ヒノカの紅薙刀・専用
description: Infantry and flying allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.

name: ミストルティン・専用
description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3. Unit takes 6 damage after combat.
攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防 +3　戦闘後、自分に 6 ダメージ

name: ウイングソード・専用
description: If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: ロムファイア・専用
description: If unit's Spd - foe's Spd >= 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack. (If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)

name: 無銘の一門の剣・専用
description: Deals +10 damage when Special triggers.

name: カミラの艶斧・専用
description: Grants Atk/Spd+3 to cavalry and flying allies within 2 spaces during combat.

name: 霧のブレス・専用
description: If unit is within 2 spaces of a sword or dragon ally, grants Atk/Def+5 during combat.

name: 義勇の槍・専用
description: If foe initiates combat, grants Spd/Def+4 during combat.

name: 傭兵団の戦斧・専用
description: At start of turn, grants Res+6 to allies within 2 spaces for 1 turn. Granted only if number of that ally's movement type on current team <= 2.

name: セルジュの恐斧・専用
description: At start of turn, converts bonuses on foes in cardinal directions with HP < unit's HP into penalties through their next actions.

name: ノーアトゥーン・専用
description: If unit’s HP <= 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally. If unit's HP >= 50%, unit can move adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.

description: If unit’s HP <= 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

description: If unit’s HP <= 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

description: If unit’s HP <= 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

name: 魔防
description: If unit’s HP <= 50%, unit can move to a space adjacent to any ally.

name: フェンサリル・専用
description: Neutralizes foes’ bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat. If unit is adjacent to an ally, grants Spd/Def+5 during combat.

description: Neutralizes foes’ bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

name: 魔防
description: Neutralizes foes’ bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

name: フォルクヴァング・専用
description: At start of combat, if unit's HP <= 80%, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat. If unit has weapon-triangle advantage, boosts Atk by 20%. If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, reduces Atk by 20%.

name: 攻撃
description: At start of combat, if unit's HP <= 80%, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat.

description: At start of combat, if unit's HP <= 80%, grants Atk/Def+7 during combat.

name: 夜刀神・専用

description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2.

name: 速さ
description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2.

name: 守備
description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2.

name: 魔防
description: Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2.

name: エッケザックス・専用
description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions. If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.

name: 攻撃
description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions.

name: 速さ
description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions.

description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions.

name: 魔防
description: Inflicts Def-6 on foes (excluding dragons) within 2 spaces at the start of each turn, through their next actions.

name: フェリシアの氷皿・専用
description: Grants Special cooldown charge +1 if foe uses magic. (Only highest value applied. Does not stack.)

name: 風神弓・専用
description: If unit's HP >= 50%, unit can move adjacent to any ally within 2 spaces.
自身のＨＰが 50% 以上の時、周囲２マス以内の味方の隣接マスに移動可能

name: 深き印の風・専用
description: ターン開始時、敵軍内で最も攻撃が高い敵の攻撃-7(敵の次回行動終了まで) 戦闘中、攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防が隣接している味方の人数×2だけ上昇

name: フォルブレイズ・専用
description: If unit initiates combat, grants Atk+6 during combat.

name: カタリナの書・専用
description: At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit’s Res through their next actions.

name: ライナロック・専用
description: At start of combat, if unit's HP <= 80%, grants Atk/Spd+7 during combat.

name: オーディンの黒書
description: If a movement Assist skill (like Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit or targets unit, grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit and target ally or unit and targeting ally for 1 turn.

自分から攻撃した時、戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ -5 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: 魔防
description: After unit attacks, inflicts Atk/Spd-5 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
自分から攻撃した時、戦闘後、敵の周囲２マスの敵の攻撃、速さ -5 (敵の次回行動終了まで)

name: ブリュンヒルデ・専用
description: If in combat against magic foe, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%. If foe uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff and unit's Def >= foe's Def+1, foe cannot make a follow-up attack.
敵が魔法の時、戦闘中、最初に受けた攻撃のダメージを30％軽減 敵が弓、暗器、魔法、杖で、敵より守備が1以上高い時、敵は追撃不可

name: 攻撃
description: If in combat against magic foe, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30%.
敵が魔法の時、戦闘中、最初に受けた攻撃のダメージを30％軽減

敵が重装の時、戦闘中、敵の強化の + を無効にする (無効になるのは鼓舞や応援等の + 効果)

name: ソール・カティ・専用
description: If unit initiates combat with HP <= 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack. Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack when HP <= 75% and attacking a foe that can counter.
自分のＨＰが 75% 以下で、自分から攻撃した時、追撃可能なら自分の攻撃直後に追撃を行う 自分のＨＰが 75% 以下で、自分から攻撃した時、敵が反撃可能なら絶対追撃

name: 攻撃
description: If unit initiates combat with HP <= 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

name: ジークムント・専用
description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn. Unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack when HP >= 90% and attacking a foe that can counter.
ターン開始時、周囲１マスの味方の攻撃 +4 (1ターン) 自分のＨＰが 90% 以上で、自分から攻撃した時、絶対追撃

description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

name: ジークリンデ・専用
description: At start of turn, grants adjacent allies Atk+4 for 1 turn. During combat, grants bonus to Atk/Spd/Def/Res = highest bonus on allies within 2 spaces. Each stat bonus calculated independently.
ターン開始時、周囲1マスの味方の攻撃+4(1ターン) 戦闘中、攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防が周囲2マスの味方の攻撃、速さ、守備、魔防の強化の最大値だけ上昇(最大値は各能力値ごとに計算)

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat if unit is adjacent to an ally.
exclusive: クロム,マルス(仮面),ルキナ

name: ファルシオン・専用
description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn. Grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

name: ファルシオン外伝・専用
description: If unit's HP = 100% at start of combat and unit initiates combat, unit attacks twice then takes 5 damage after combat.

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

name: 速さ
description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

name: 守備
description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.

description: Restores 10 HP at the start of every second turn.
